front.title: Request to move Connection of IPv6 Domains via IPv4 Clouds (6to4) to Historic status

abstract.t: Experience with the "Connection of IPv6 Domains via IPv4 Clouds(6to4)" IPv6 transitioning mechanism has shown that the mechanism isunsuitable for widespread deployment and use in the Internet. Thisdocument requests that RFC3056 and the companion document "An AnycastPrefix for 6to4 Relay Routers" RFC3068 are moved to historic status.
